messages.message: Invalid KTXcubemapIncomplete value. The two MSB must be 0.
messages.details: The value is 11000000 but the two MSB must be 0 (00XXXXXX).

messages.message: Invalid KTXcubemapIncomplete value. No face is marked present.
messages.details: No face bit is set as present but at least 1 face must be present.
